title: Add a New Contact to CRM
description: An agent meets a potential client at an open house and needs to add them to their CRM for follow-up.

tasks.description: Gather the contact's name, phone number, and email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the basic contact information.

tasks.description: Create a new contact record in the CRM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new contact profile.

tasks.description: Add the contact to a 'New Lead' follow-up campaign or drip email sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the contact to the appropriate marketing campaign.
